mapper.sql: select office_address_count, office_users_count, quotation_count, quotation_price, avg_quotation_price, contract_count, contract_price, avg_contract_price, overall_discount_rate, quotation discount rate, refund_amount, delay_contract_count, delay_contract_proportion from busi_data
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(os.office_staff_name) FROM office_staff os WHERE os.`create_time` >=DATE_FORMAT(#{params.beginCreateTime},'%y-%m-%d') AND os.`create_time` <= DATE_FORMAT(#{params.endCreateTime},'%y-%m-%d')

SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT os.`office_address`) FROM office_staff os WHERE os.`create_time` >=DATE_FORMAT(#{params.beginCreateTime},'%y-%m-%d') AND os.`create_time` <= DATE_FORMAT(#{params.endCreateTime},'%y-%m-%d')
SELECT COUNT(1) FROM busi_quotation bq WHERE bq.`create_time` >=DATE_FORMAT(#{params.beginCreateTime},'%y-%m-%d') AND bq.`create_time` <= DATE_FORMAT(#{params.endCreateTime},'%y-%m-%d')

SELECT SUM(bqd.`details_price` * bqd.`number`) FROM busi_quotation bq LEFT JOIN busi_quotation_details bqd ON bq.`quotation_id` = bqd.`quotation_id` WHERE bq.`create_time` >=DATE_FORMAT(#{params.beginCreateTime},'%y-%m-%d') AND bq.`create_time` <= DATE_FORMAT(#{params.endCreateTime},'%y-%m-%d')

SELECT SUM(bc.`contract_price`) FROM busi_contract bc , busi_quotation bq WHERE bc.qutation_id =bq.quotation_id and bc.`signing_date` >=DATE_FORMAT(#{params.beginCreateTime},'%y-%m-%d') AND bc.`signing_date` <= DATE_FORMAT(#{params.endCreateTime},'%y-%m-%d')

SELECT COUNT(1) FROM busi_contract bc , busi_quotation bq WHERE bc.qutation_id =bq.quotation_id and bc.`signing_date` >=DATE_FORMAT(#{params.beginCreateTime},'%y-%m-%d') AND bc.`signing_date` <= DATE_FORMAT(#{params.endCreateTime},'%y-%m-%d')

SELECT SUM(bqd.`details_price` * bqd.`number`) FROM busi_quotation bq INNER JOIN busi_contract bc ON bq.quotation_id = bc.`qutation_id` LEFT JOIN busi_quotation_details bqd ON bc.`qutation_id` = bqd.`quotation_id` WHERE bc.`signing_date` >= DATE_FORMAT(#{params.beginCreateTime},'%y-%m-%d') AND bc.`signing_date` <= DATE_FORMAT(#{params.endCreateTime},'%y-%m-%d')

SELECT SUM(bc.`repaymentAmount`) FROM busi_contract bc , busi_quotation bq WHERE bc.qutation_id =bq.quotation_id and bc.`signing_date` >= DATE_FORMAT(#{params.beginCreateTime},'%y-%m-%d') AND bc.`signing_date` <= DATE_FORMAT(#{params.endCreateTime},'%y-%m-%d')

SELECT COUNT(1) FROM busi_contract bc , busi_quotation bq WHERE bc.qutation_id =bq.quotation_id and bc.`signing_date` >=DATE_FORMAT(#{params.beginCreateTime},'%y-%m-%d') AND bc.`signing_date` <= DATE_FORMAT(#{params.endCreateTime},'%y-%m-%d') AND bc.`delivery_time` < DATE_FORMAT(#{createTime},'%y-%m-%d') AND bc.`contract_type` = 0

SELECT COUNT(1) FROM busi_contract bc , busi_quotation bq WHERE bc.qutation_id =bq.quotation_id and bc.`signing_date` >=DATE_FORMAT(#{params.beginCreateTime},'%y-%m-%d') AND bc.`signing_date` <= DATE_FORMAT(#{params.endCreateTime},'%y-%m-%d') AND bc.`contract_type` = 1
mapper.insert:
insert into busi_data
office_address_count, office_users_count, quotation_count, quotation_price, avg_quotation_price, contract_count, contract_price, avg_contract_price, overall_discount_rate, quotation discount rate, refund_amount, delay_contract_count, delay_contract_proportion,
#{officeAddressCount}, #{officeUsersCount}, #{quotationCount}, #{quotationPrice}, #{avgQuotationPrice}, #{contractCount}, #{contractPrice}, #{avgContractPrice}, #{overallDiscountRate}, #{quotationDiscountRate}, #{refundAmount}, #{delayContractCount}, #{delayContractProportion},
mapper.delete:
delete from busi_data where office_address_count in
#{officeAddressCount}
